title: Bug 3666 - Code Completion Hungry code assist
description: Under certain circumstances code assist eats too much code.
OB:
The code is changed to: baz(x.foo().foo())
I would rather it gave me: baz(x.foo()x.foo())
EB: The code should be changed to: baz(x.foo().foo())
SR:
1. Open the enclosed class.
2. Add a parameter to the 'baz' call in the 'bar' method to make the program correct.
